attributes.action: enable students to choose to have their student loan paid to them each month, instead of at the start of each term.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many student face the same problem: towards the end of the second month of a term, their loan is depleted and they are left with no money to support themselves. 

At the moment, there is a gap of 3 months between loan payments. These gaps generally cover the three terms: 
October - December, January - March and April - June. 

Many full-time courses make it difficult to get a job to support living costs, and many courses have a timetable that is constantly subject to change; again making it incredibly difficult to get and maintain part-time work. As such the loan is often the sole means a student has to get by. 

By allowing the student to choose to have an installment paid to them at the start of each month, in the worst case scenario a student will have less time to wait until they can afford to live again.
